casebody.data:
April 26, 2002

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-1987. State v. Coleman.

Hamilton App. No. C-850340. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for an order to show cause and/or order granting relief, including emergency relief,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion be, and hereby is, denied, effective April 25, 2002, the date of this entry.
